title.rendered: Okair (Okay Airways) Offices in China Address | Phone | Email

content.rendered:
Okair Airways   is an airline headquartered in Shunyi District, Beijing, People’s Republic of China. It operates passenger flight services and dedicated cargo services.  Okair Airways was established in 2004. Its main hub are Tianjin Binhai International Airport, Xi’an Xianyang International Airport and secondary hub is Changsha Huanghua International Airport.

 

Okair Airways Sales Office in Tianjin, China

 Address: Tianjin Sales Department

Block C, 11th Floor, North Financial Building, No. 5 Youyi Road, Hexi District, Tianjin

 Phone: Okay Airline Service Complaint Hotline: 95307

Tel: 022-23233399

Fax: 022-88351979

Email: Complaint email: okkhts@okair.net

 Working hours: Okay Aviation Customer Service Center operates from 08:00-23:00 daily

Okair Airways Official website: https://www.okair.net/login.action

Okair Airways Online Check-in: www.Okair.com/online check-in

Check Okair Airways schedule here: www.Okair.com/flight schedule

Check Okair Airways flight status here: www.Okair.com/flight status

Okair Airways Baggage Allowance

Okair Airways Baggage

Okair Airways Sales office in Changsha, China

 Address: Changsha Sales Department:

Room 668, 6th Floor, Block A, Changsha Building, 59 Wuyi Avenue, Furong District, Changsha, Hunan, China

 Phone: 0731-84155238 0731-84111338

Fax: 0731-89871472

Fax: 023-63830590

Fax: 52235527

Fax: 0571-85454271

Fax: 028-86266400

H Island, the domestic departure hall of Tianjin Binhai International Airport, Dongli District, Tianjin

Fax: 022-24905301

Okair Airways Airport office in Changsha, China

 Address: Changsha Airport Counter:

Next to Exit 2 of T1 Terminal, Huanghua International Airport, Changsha, Hunan Province

 Phone: 0731-84799705 Zip code: 410137 Business on duty mobile phone: 18920207781

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Okair Airways

Total fleet: 26

Boeing 737

  • Boeing 737-300
  • Boeing 737-500
  • Boeing 737-800
  • Boeing 737-900

Queries handled by Okair Airways Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Holy Clouds Club

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Okair Airways Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Okair Airways: (click on the stars below)
